metadata.description: Relationship 'facility_specialist' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all facilities with certain specialties.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The block where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The state where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people that have the specialty Anesthesiology in this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|51' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people with the specialty Obstetrics and Gynecology in the facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|67' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people working in this facility with the specialty Pediatrics.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|73' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all facilities with certain specialties.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of specialists (Obs & Gyn, Pediatrician, Anesthesiologist) deployed at FRUs.
